issue.title: [Java] Flight client doesn't handle auth correctly in some cases
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5249](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5249). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Flight Client does not add auth token to some async requests. The interceptor doesn't  get added when creating a new ClientCall
